value.title: Microsoft helps protect Amazon rainforest with AI project
value.excerpt: Microsoft has partnered with environmental groups to create an artificial intelligence (AI) -based tool that could help to stop deforestation in the Amazon rainforest. The tool, called PrevisIA, uses machine learning to spot possible trends in forest conversion from deforestation.

value.title: Deserialization bug in TensorFlow machine learning framework allowed arbitrary code execution
value.excerpt: The team behind TensorFlow, Google’s popular open source Python machine learning library, has revoked support for YAML due to an arbitrary code execution vulnerability. YAML is a general-purpose format used to store data and pass objects between processes and applications.
